first_translate: right before I was sucked into the darkness,
second_translate: Right before I was swallowed by the darkness,
label: before I got sucked into the darkness,

first_translate: even if it was just for a moment,
second_translate: Even if it was only for a moment,
label: it was only for a brief moment,

first_translate: I was able to stop the darkness from taking over.
second_translate: I was able to stop the darkness from approaching.
label: but I was able to stop the darkness from coming closer.

first_translate: does that mean...
second_translate: Am I perhaps...
label: could it be that...

first_translate: ...I can control the darkness?
second_translate: Can I control the darkness?
label: ...I can control the darkness?

first_translate: if so, that raises another question.
second_translate: If so, that raises another question.
label: then that leaves me with another question.

hangle: 원작의 피오나는 어둠을 통제할 수 없었다.
first_translate: the original fiona couldn’t control the darkness.
second_translate: The original Fiona couldn't control the darkness.
label: fiona in the original novel couldn't control the darkness.

first_translate: so why was I able to?
second_translate: But why was I successful?
label: so how come I can do what she couldn’t?

first_translate: we have the same body and the same talent.
second_translate: I have the same body and the same talent.
label: we have the same body and abilities.

first_translate: I guess I won’t be able to find the answer to this either.
second_translate: There's no point in worrying about this—I'll never find the answer.
label: this is another question I just can't seem to figure out,

first_translate: ugh, my head hurts.
second_translate: Ugh, my head hurts. It really hurts.
label: and it's giving me a massive headache.

first_translate: ah, I’m so full!
second_translate: Ah, I'm so full!
label: oh, I'm so full.

first_translate: marquess relton must have been really grateful.
second_translate: Marquess Relton must have been quite grateful.
label: marquess relton must really appreciate what we did.

first_translate: he served us so many delicious dishes.
second_translate: So many delicious dishes were served.
label: he served so many good dishes.

first_translate: yeah...
second_translate: I guess so.
label: I know...

first_translate: hmm...
second_translate: Hmm~
label: hm...

first_translate: does he not feel well?
second_translate: Are you not feeling well?
label: is he not feeling well?

first_translate: he didn’t eat much earlier either.
second_translate: You didn’t eat much earlier either.
label: I noticed he barely ate his food.

first_translate: I’m glad I came with the envoy this time.
second_translate: I'm glad I joined the envoy this time.
label: I'm glad I joined this mission...

first_translate: why?
second_translate: ...Why?
label: why is that...?

first_translate: we gained a lot from this trip.
second_translate: We gained something.
label: I got a lot out of it,

first_translate: the people at the academy were better than I expected.
second_translate: The people at the academy were quite decent, better than I thought.
label: and it was nice to meet people from the academy too.

hangle: 그 사람들, 목숨 빚을 졌다고 생각하고 있으니까…
first_translate: they think they owe me their lives,
second_translate: They think they owe their lives to me.
label: they think they  owe us for saving their lives,

hangle: 나중에 분명 호의적인 태도를 보일 거야.
first_translate: so I’m sure they’ll be friendly to me in the future.
second_translate: I'm sure they'll show a favorable attitude in the future.
label: and I'm sure  they'll be forever grateful.

first_translate: on top of that,
second_translate: On top of that,
label: also,

first_translate: I realized I’m more amazing than I thought.
second_translate: I was greater than I thought.
label: I was a lot more amazing than I thought.

first_translate: I was able to control the darkness...
second_translate: Darkness,
label: it wasn’t easy,

first_translate: ...even though it was hard.
second_translate: It was difficult, but I definitely controlled it.
label: but I was able to control the darkness.

hangle: 분명 어둠 토벌에 엄청난 도움이 될 거야.
first_translate: I’m sure it’ll be a huge help in defeating the darkness.
second_translate: I'm sure it’ll be a huge help in the subjugation of the darkness.
label: I know I'll be of tremendous help when the time to stop the darkness comes.

first_translate: are you planning to get involved with the darkness again?
second_translate: Are you thinking of getting involved with the darkness again?
label: are you thinking of getting involved in the darkness again...?

first_translate: of course!
second_translate: Of course!
label: of course!

first_translate: fiona.
second_translate: fiona.
label: fiona.

first_translate: fiona!
second_translate: Fiona!
label: fiona!

first_translate: his body was as cold as ice.
second_translate: Touching his body, cold as ice,
label: when I felt her body grow cold as ice,

first_translate: it felt like my world was falling apart.
second_translate: It felt like my world was falling apart.
label: it felt like my world was coming to an end.

first_translate: you don’t need to help.
second_translate: No need to help.
label: you don't need to help.

first_translate: I didn’t expect him to be happy,
second_translate: Even if you’re not happy,
label: I didn't think he'd be happy to hear it,

first_translate: but I thought he’d congratulate me at least.
second_translate: I thought I’d at least get some congratulations.
label: but I thought he'd at least congratulate me.

first_translate: why?
second_translate: ...Why?
label: why not...?

first_translate: don’t ever...
second_translate: Don't do the same thing as last time.
label: I never want you to...

first_translate: ...do something like that again.
second_translate: Don't ever do that again.
label: ...repeat what you did ever again.

first_translate: it’s reckless and dangerous.
second_translate: That’s absurd and reckless.
label: that would be unbelievably reckless.

first_translate: but I did the right thing.
second_translate: Still, what I did was right.
label: but still, I did do the right thing.

first_translate: I know.
second_translate: I know.
label: I know that,

first_translate: there’s plenty of room for reflection.
second_translate: There's plenty of room for remorse.
label: but there's a lot that could have gone wrong.

first_translate: I was the one in charge there.
second_translate: I was the one in charge there.
label: I was responsible for everyone there,

first_translate: it was the best I could do.
second_translate: That was the best option.
label: so it was the best decision I could make.

first_translate: yes, you’re right.
second_translate: Yeah, in fact, you’re right.
label: yes, you’re absolutely right.

first_translate: you’re a great asset.
second_translate: You’re a powerful force.
label: you may be a great force of power,

hangle: 가끔은 생존을 우선시해야 할 때가 있어.
first_translate: sometimes, you have to prioritize survival.
second_translate: Sometimes, you have to prioritize survival.
label: but there are times when we must prioritize survival.

hangle: 그리고 어둠에 대한 정보는 너한테도 도움이 되잖아.
first_translate: and the information about the darkness will help you too.
second_translate: And the information about the darkness will help you too.
label: but I thought knowledge of the darkness could  be helpful for  you too.

first_translate: that’s why I fought.
second_translate: I fought with that in mind.
label: that's why I went in to fight.

first_translate: but...
second_translate: But...
label: but...

first_translate: I’m telling you,
second_translate: So,
label: ...that's why I'm saying...

first_translate: I don’t need that kind of help!
second_translate: I said I don't need that kind of help…!
label: ...I don't need your help...!

hangle: 억지를 써서라도 너를 잃고 싶지 않아…
first_translate: even if I have to be stubborn, I don’t want to lose you...
second_translate: Even if I have to be stubborn, I don't want to lose you...
label: I don't care if I’m being stubborn as long as it means I won't lose you...

first_translate: siegren...
second_translate: ...Siegren.
label: siegren,

first_translate: if you’re annoyed, don’t be sarcastic.
second_translate: If you're annoyed, don't be sarcastic.
label: if there's something bothering you, stop beating around the bush.

first_translate: just get mad at me!
second_translate: Rather, just get mad!
label: just get mad at me instead!

first_translate: you... idiot!
second_translate: you... idiot!
label: you... idiot!

first_translate: wait, fiona!
second_translate: Wait, Fiona!
label: fiona, wait!

first_translate: go away!
second_translate: Go away!
label: go away!

first_translate: don’t follow me!
second_translate: Don't follow me!
label: don't follow me!

first_translate: that’s not what I meant...
second_translate: That's not it...
label: I didn't mean it like that...

first_translate: uh... um...
second_translate: Uh... um...
label: uh... um...

first_translate: should I bring her some sweets...?
second_translate: …Should I bring some sweets?
label: do you want me to get you a cookie or something...?

first_translate: I’ve never really tried to comfort a lady before.
second_translate: I've rarely had to comfort a lady before.
label: he's never had to console a lady before.

first_translate: how old do you think I am?
second_translate: How old do you think I am?
label: how old do you think I am?

first_translate: anyway, just go back to what you were doing.
second_translate: just keep going where you were headed.
label: you can just be on your way.

first_translate: why did you follow me?
second_translate: Why did you follow me?
label: why did you have to follow me?

hangle: 네가 울면서 창고로 도망치는데 어떻게 그냥 가나.
first_translate: how could I just leave when you ran away crying into the storage room?
second_translate: How could I just leave when you ran away crying into the storage?
label: how was I supposed to walk away when you were running to the storage room in tears?

hangle: 그런 소리를 다 할 줄 아네.
first_translate: I didn’t expect to hear that from you.
second_translate: I didn't expect to hear that from you.
label: I never expected to hear that coming from you.

first_translate: ...fought with siegren.
second_translate: I fought with Siegren.
label: ...had a fight with siegren.

first_translate: it must have been about the darkness.
second_translate: It must have been about something related to the darkness.
label: it was about the darkness.

hangle: 맞아. 내 행동은 충분히 옳았다고 생각하는데.
first_translate: yes. I think I did the right thing,
second_translate: Yes. I think what I did was completely right.
label: sure, I know what I did was the right thing,

hangle: 시그렌이 괜히 말을 밉게 하는 거야.
first_translate: but siegren was being mean for no reason.
second_translate: Siegren was saying mean things for no reason.
label: but I didn't like what siegren was getting at.

first_translate: I know he’s worried about me, but...
second_translate: I know he's worried about me, but...
label: I know that he's just worried about me...

first_translate: I should wipe her tears...
second_translate: Should wipe the tears...
label: I should wipe her tears...

first_translate: no,
second_translate: No,
label: no,

first_translate: I shouldn’t...
second_translate: That wouldn't be right...
label: I can't do that...

first_translate: fiona heylon,
second_translate: Fiona Heylon.
label: fiona heylon,

first_translate: you’re a good lady.
second_translate: You're a good young lady.
label: you’re a good lady.

first_translate: you were a bit reckless, but you’re responsible.
second_translate: You were a bit reckless, but you have a sense of responsibility.
label: you can be a bit reckless, but you're responsible.

hangle: 내 생각에도 네 판단이 객관적으로 옳았다.
first_translate: I also think your judgment was objectively correct.
second_translate: I also believe that your judgment was objectively correct.
label: I think your judgment was objectively right.

hangle: 그러니 시그렌이 뭐라고 했든 별로 신경 쓰지 않았으면 좋겠어.
first_translate: so I hope you don’t care about what siegren said.
second_translate: So I hope you don't pay much attention to whatever Siegren said.
label: that's why I don't think you should pay much attention to whatever siegren said.

first_translate: you’re too good...
second_translate: You're too good to be swayed just by your boyfriend's opinion.
label: it would be a shame to see a girl of your caliber get shaken...

first_translate: ...to be shaken up by what your boyfriend thinks.
second_translate: You're too good for that.
label: ...by what your boyfriend thinks.
